tables.name: Store
columns: id bigint GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY NOT NULL

tables.name: SubStore
columns: id bigint GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY NOT NULL

tables.name: Vendors
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
created_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now()

tables.name: add_banner
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()

tables.name: add_banner_group
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()

tables.name: add_banner_group_product
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()

tables.name: banners
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()

tables.name: bbm_dost
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()

tables.name: bnb
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()

tables.name: bnb_group
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()

tables.name: bnb_group_product
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()

tables.name: brand
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()

tables.name: bulk_order_enquiries
columns: request_date timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
last_updated timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: bulk_product_settings
columns: created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: bulk_wholesale_settings
columns: is_bulk_enabled boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true
created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
tier_name character varying DEFAULT 'Standard Bulk'::character varying

tables.name: business_users
columns: id bigint GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY NOT NULL
created_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now()

tables.name: cart_items
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
added_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: categories
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()

tables.name: cod_orders
columns: id integer NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('cod_orders_id_seq'::regclass)
created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: daily_deals
columns: id integer NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('daily_deals_id_seq'::regclass)
created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: daily_deals_product
columns: created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: delivery_zones
columns: name character varying NOT NULL UNIQUE
created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()

tables.name: enquiries
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

status character varying DEFAULT 'pending'::character varying CHECK (status::text = ANY (ARRAY['pending'::character varying::text, 'replied'::character varying::text, 'resolved'::character varying::text, 'closed'::character varying::text]))
updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
type character varying DEFAULT 'regular'::character varying CHECK (type::text = ANY (ARRAY['regular'::character varying::text, 'custom_printing'::character varying::text]))

tables.name: enquiry_items
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()

tables.name: enquiry_replies
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: event_elevate
columns: id integer NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('event_elevate_id_seq'::regclass)
bg_color character varying DEFAULT 'from-purple-400 to-orange-400'::character varying
created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: groups
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()

tables.name: notifications
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()
created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
expiry_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL

tables.name: order_items
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()

tables.name: order_tracking
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
timestamp timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: order_warehouse_assignments
columns: assigned_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()

status character varying DEFAULT 'assigned'::character varying CHECK (status::text = ANY (ARRAY['assigned'::character varying, 'fulfilled'::character varying, 'cancelled'::character varying]::text[]))

tables.name: orders
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now()

tables.name: pincode_locations
columns: created_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now()

tables.name: print_request_replies
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: print_requests
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
user_id uuid NOT NULL CHECK (user_id IS NOT NULL AND user_id <> '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'::uuid)
created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: product_grid_settings
columns: id bigint GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY NOT NULL
created_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now()

tables.name: product_sections
columns: section_key character varying NOT NULL UNIQUE
created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: product_variants
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now()

tables.name: product_warehouse_stock
columns: stock_quantity integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 CHECK (stock_quantity >= 0)
created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()

tables.name: products
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
delivery_type character varying DEFAULT 'nationwide'::character varying CHECK (delivery_type::text = ANY (ARRAY['nationwide'::character varying, 'zonal'::character varying]::text[]))
delivery_updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()

warehouse_mapping_type character varying DEFAULT 'nationwide'::character varying CHECK (warehouse_mapping_type::text = ANY (ARRAY['nationwide'::character varying, 'zonal'::character varying, 'central'::character varying, 'zonal_with_fallback'::character varying, 'custom'::character varying, 'auto_central_to_zonal'::character varying, 'selective_zonal'::character varying, 'central_only'::character varying, 'zonal_only'::character varying]::text[]))
updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()

product_type character varying DEFAULT 'nationwide'::character varying CHECK (product_type::text = ANY (ARRAY['nationwide'::character varying, 'zonal'::character varying, 'perishable'::character varying]::text[]))

tables.name: promo_banners
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
button_text character varying DEFAULT 'SHOP NOW'::character varying
bg_color character varying DEFAULT 'from-indigo-600 via-purple-600 to-pink-600'::character varying
accent_color character varying DEFAULT 'from-pink-400 to-rose-400'::character varying
created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: promotional_settings
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
setting_key character varying NOT NULL UNIQUE
updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()

tables.name: quick_pick
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()

tables.name: quick_pick_group
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()

tables.name: quickpick_group_product
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()

tables.name: recommended_store
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()

tables.name: refund_requests
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
refund_type character varying NOT NULL CHECK (refund_type::text = ANY (ARRAY['order_cancellation'::character varying, 'order_return'::character varying, 'partial_refund'::character varying]::text[]))
payment_method character varying NOT NULL CHECK (payment_method::text = ANY (ARRAY['prepaid'::character varying, 'cod'::character varying]::text[]))
refund_mode character varying DEFAULT 'bank_transfer'::character varying CHECK (refund_mode::text = ANY (ARRAY['bank_transfer'::character varying, 'original_payment'::character varying]::text[]))

status character varying DEFAULT 'pending'::character varying CHECK (status::text = ANY (ARRAY['pending'::character varying, 'approved'::character varying, 'processing'::character varying, 'completed'::character varying, 'rejected'::character varying]::text[]))
created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: return_order_items
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: return_orders
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
return_type character varying NOT NULL CHECK (return_type::text = ANY (ARRAY['return'::character varying, 'cancellation'::character varying]::text[]))

status character varying DEFAULT 'pending'::character varying CHECK (status::text = ANY (ARRAY['pending'::character varying, 'approved'::character varying, 'rejected'::character varying, 'processing'::character varying, 'completed'::character varying]::text[]))
created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: saving_zone
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()

tables.name: saving_zone_group
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()

tables.name: saving_zone_group_product
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()

tables.name: shipping_banners
columns: id bigint GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY NOT NULL
created_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now()

tables.name: shop_by_stores
columns: created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: stock_movements
columns: movement_type character varying NOT NULL CHECK (movement_type::text = ANY (ARRAY['inbound'::character varying, 'outbound'::character varying, 'transfer'::character varying, 'adjustment'::character varying, 'reservation'::character varying, 'release'::character varying]::text[]))
performed_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()

tables.name: store_section_mappings
columns: mapping_type character varying NOT NULL CHECK (mapping_type::text = ANY (ARRAY['store_section'::character varying, 'section_product'::character varying]::text[]))
created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()

tables.name: subcategories
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()

tables.name: transaction_types
columns: type_code character varying NOT NULL UNIQUE
created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: unique_section
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()

tables.name: unique_section_product
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()

tables.name: user_addresses
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()
created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()

tables.name: user_notifications
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: users
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
gstin character varying CHECK (gstin IS NULL OR length(gstin::text) = 15)

tables.name: video_banner
columns: id bigint GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY NOT NULL
created_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now()

tables.name: video_cards
columns: id integer NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('video_cards_id_seq'::regclass)
created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()

tables.name: warehouse_pincodes
columns: created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()

tables.name: warehouse_zones
columns: created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()

tables.name: warehouses
columns: id integer NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('warehouses_id_seq'::regclass)
name character varying NOT NULL UNIQUE
type character varying NOT NULL CHECK (type::text = ANY (ARRAY['zonal'::character varying, 'division'::character varying]::text[]))
created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()

tables.name: wholesale_bulk_order_items
columns: created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: wholesale_bulk_orders
columns: created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

tables.name: wishlist_items
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
added_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT timezone('utc'::text, now())

tables.name: you_may_like
columns: id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()

tables.name: zone_pincodes
columns: id integer NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('zone_pincodes_id_seq'::regclass)
created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
